verses.name: 1 Samuel 11:11
verses.text: And it was so on the morrow, that Saul put the people in three companies; and they came into the midst of the host in the morning watch, and slew the Ammonites until the heat of the day: and it came to pass, that they which remained were scattered, so that two of them were not left together.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 11:12
verses.text: And the people said unto Samuel, Who is he that said, Shall Saul reign over us? bring the men, that we may put them to death.
